titleStmt.title: The counter scuffle Whereunto is added The counter rat. Written by R.S.
titleStmt.author: R. S. (Robert Speed)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.B. and are to be sold by Iohn Stafford,

notesStmt.note: Ascribed to Robert Speed. Cf. BM, Halkett & Laing, Allibone.
Imperfect; pages are stained and have print show-through affecting legibility.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
